author: jstrachan
msg: Patch to avoid multiple start/end document events occuring when outputting files

author: jstrachan
msg: Allow derived JellyContext implementations to customize the XMLParser implementation used when including Jelly scripts.
This allows custom contexts to configure the parsing, such as to register certain namespaces, to enable validation or to register alternative ExpresionFactory instances

author: jstrachan
msg: added support for a defaultValue attribute which allows a default value to be specified in cases where the value expression is null or a blank string.

author: jstrachan
msg: added a first cut of a parse tag that can be used to parse a Jelly script from a string or from the output of its body
if a var attribute is speciried then the scirpt is defined; otherwise its executed
